summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works and the City Engineer to include the construction of a sewer in East Blaine Street, between Nineteenth Avenue North and East Howe Street in connection with the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue North et al (Local Improvement District No. 2503) and to include in the assessment roll for said district the costs necessary to cover the construction of said sewer, said costs to be levied upon the property specially benefited thereby.
